help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Tutorial on how to use this tool

contact.title: Contact us!
contact.text: If you found a Bug, or just have a good idea for this tool. Please reach out to one of the maintainers listed below. Click on the mail-icon next to one of the email-addresses to open a new draft in your mail program.

Windowsize.title: We're sorry
Windowsize.subtitle: The window is too small for the correct display of this web page. Please reduce the zoom of the browser, or drag the window a little larger.
